text: Basi ni ŵam’bichilile jumpepe mwa (achakongwe) ŵaŵili ŵala, junankwenda mwasonisoni. (Jwankongwe) jwatite: “Chisimu atati ŵangu akum’bilanga kuti akan’dipile malipilo ga kutumwechesya uwwe (ilango yetu).” Basi ndema ja ŵam’bichilile (Shuaibu) ni kunsimbila abali, jwalakwe jwatite: “Nkajogopa, n’jokweche ku ŵandu ŵalupuso.”
